text: Peter Momber (4 January 1921 – 23 January 1975) was a German footballer who played for Borussia Neunkirchen, 1. FC Saarbrücken, SV St. Ingbert 1945 and the Saarland national team as a defender. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1975 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:SV St. Ingbert 1945 players Category:Association football defenders
title: Peter Momber
